channel.title: Purepkz 508 (lots of reqeusts) (leeched version of mezzyscape v3.5)
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape.
since every one is searching for a 508 pk source, here is one. Purepkz is my leeched server of chris's server, mezzyscape v3.5 i think so, but i gave source away and it was released « on: April 20, 2010, 02:16:28 pm ». It's bad coded but great to create a 508 pk server from base.
[img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/mconi3/PuRePkZ.jpg[/img]
hope i helped some people.!?
download [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/ehgnjjvkztxfta3/PuRe%20PkZ.rar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ehgnjjvkztxfta3/PuRe%20PkZ.rar?dl=0[/url]
greetings me.
